title: Where The Clouds Stop
alternative_title: Ci Jian Xing Yun Zhi ; This Is Where the Clouds Stop ; Where the Clouds Stop ; Cǐ Jiān Xíng Yún Zhǐ ; 此间行云止
status: Ci Jian Xing Yun Zhi ; This Is Where the Clouds Stop ; Where the Clouds Stop ; Cǐ Jiān Xíng Yún Zhǐ ; 此间行云止
description:
Description :
        Time is a strange thing. The person she killed the day before yesterday had already begun to rot. But when she came home the next day, they were standing in her house, smiling at her. What is happening? The doctor told her if she took the medicine she would wake up! Where am I? What is this? Who are you?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 0: Prologue: A Plague Of Insects
